body:
Comment 20: 
You were correct, it did crash in exactly the place you said it would.  I have attached
the screenshot.

I am using a GDB package downloaded for Windows X64 from:
http://sourceforge.net/projects/mingw-w64/files/Toolchains%20targetting%20Win64/Personal%20Builds/rubenvb/4.7.0-2/
Attachments: 1. Crash3.png (54200 bytes)
